item.description:
Hi Everyone,

We are going to see the Boston Bruins play the Toronto Maple Leafs on Thursday November 16. We are going to to get group discounted tickets and they will cost 30 dollars each. If we don't get 20 people then tickets will be 33.50 each. Friends are welcome of course but you need to let me know how many tickets you need. You can send me an email at ascholte@gmail.com If you want to go I am asking for a 15 dollar deposit for each ticket. The easiest way to send me the money is paypal and there is a link at the bottom. To save the 1 dollar service charge just send the money to ascholte@gmail.com (manually through paypal). If you have any questions please let me know.

Hope to see you there!

Your Meetup Organizers.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Bruins vs. Toronto Maple Leafs
